projects.title: Deep Learning for Optic Fiber
projects.description: The aim of this project is to teach a Deep Learning model to remove non-linearity produced by an Optic Fiber when in a Communication System. This project is done for the Deep Learning class in my master year 2 MICAS in collaboration with my partner Valentin Gorse.

projects.title: Dynamic Time Warping (DTW) Illustration
projects.description: Check out how the Dynamic Time Warping (DTW) algorithm whithout applying a warping window tries to find an optimal path to allign 2 Time Series of the SmoothSubspace dataset of the UCR Archive.

projects.title: Dynamic Time Warping (DTW) with Warping Window Illustration
projects.description: Check out how the Dynamic Time Warping (DTW) algorithm when applying a warping window tries to find an optimal path to allign 2 Time Series of the SmoothSubspace dataset of the UCR Archive.

projects.title: Soft-DTW Barrycentering Illustration
projects.description: Check out how the Soft Dynamic Time Warping (Soft-DTW) algorithm's barrycenter results on the Coffe Time Series dataset of the UCR Archive.
